es.cv.gvcase.trmanager
Class Transformation

java.lang.Object
  es.cv.gvcase.trmanager.Transformation

public abstract class Transformation
extends java.lang.Object

Definition of what is considered a Transformation by the Transformation Manager.

Method Detail

transform

public abstract boolean transform(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> inputs,
                                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> outputs,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> messageList)
Transforms some input resources into some output resources.

Parameters:
inputs - The input resources that must receive the transformation. The key in the hashmap are the parameter name while the value are TransformedResource.
outputs - The output resources that are produced by the transformation. The key in the hashmap are the parameter name while the value are TransformedResource.
messageList - A message list which informs about events that happened while transforming.
Returns:
true, if successful

transform

public boolean transform(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> inputs,
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> outputs,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> messageList,
                         TransformedResource configuration)
Transforms some input resources into some output resources with some configuration.

Parameters:
inputs - The input resources that must receive the transformation. The key in the hashmap are the parameter name while the value are TransformedResource.
outputs - The output resources that are produced by the transformation. The key in the hashmap are the parameter name while the value are TransformedResource.
messageList - the message list
configuration - a TransformedResource that holds the transformation configuration.
Returns:
true, if successful

inputsValid

public abstract boolean inputsValid(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> inputs,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorList)
This method checks if input resources are valid for the transformation

Parameters:
inputs - The input TransformedResource that are under validation.
errorList - A message list with the errors that were detected.
Returns:
true, if inputs are valid and false otherwise
